External probes or scans attempting to e.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Zeek ssl.log
External probes or scans attempting to e.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log, http.log, and ssl.log for connections originating from external IPs targeting common service ports (e.g., 22, 80, 443, 3389). Look for unusual patterns in user agents (http.log), SSL client details (ssl.log), or rapid connection attempts (conn.log) characteristic of scanning tools. Use frequency analysis to identify source IPs conducting widespread probes.

Attempts to enumerate system information.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation events associated with commands used to query system hardware information (e.g., 'wmic computersystem get model,manufacturer', 'systeminfo', 'Get-ComputerInfo'). Filter for processes initiated by unusual users or running in unexpected contexts. Use correlation analysis to link these events with other suspicious activities on the host.
